author: Erica Orden
title: Key Prosecution Witness Is Grilled on Credibility in Bribery Case
text:
A key prosecution witness in a federal corruption case against a former top aide to New York Gov. Andrew Cuomo testified Wednesday to his own yearslong criminal résumé that included fraud, embezzlement and lawsuits involving friends, family, his lawyers, a gym, a tutor and even a dog walker.
The witness, Todd Howe, a longtime Cuomo associate, is cooperating with the government in its bribery case against the former aide, Joseph Percoco. Under cross-examination in Manhattan federal court, Mr. Howe said his testimony against...
